entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind light except northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
